articles.author: Nathaniel Meyersohn
articles.title: Today’s ‘economic blackout’ began from an unlikely source. But it’s tapped into Americans’ anger - CNN
articles.description: In early February, John Schwarz, a self-described “mindfulness and meditation facilitator,” proposed a 24-hour nationwide “economic blackout” of major chains on the last day of the month.
articles.content:
In early February, John Schwarz, a self-described mindfulness and meditation facilitator, proposed a 24-hour nationwide economic blackout of major chains on the last day of the month.
